name: Music_3865.wav
caption: This is an afrobeat remix of a hip-hop music piece. There is a male vocalist singing in a rap-like manner. A repeated hollering sample can be heard. The rhythmic background is provided by a variety of afro percussion elements. There is a danceable feel to it. This piece could be played at nightclubs or dance clubs. It could also be used as an accompaniment piece at a modern dance course.
